content.description: Starts left of the big bush then connects with Twelve Nations.  The route wanders slightly left around a bulge then moves back right to a nice flake.  One of my favorite routes at Indian Creek with multiple variations that use a wide variety of techniques, a great test piece for new leaders.
content.protection: 12 bolts to chains.  70 meter rope recommended because the route wanders a little bit.
content.location: While standing at the base of the buttress it is the route that begins on the left side of the big bush right next to the road.

content.description: Route starts just right of the big bush and connects with Wounded Knee.  Start on a slab that wanders left around a challenging bulge then move right up to a flake with multiple variations.  Great for the new leader or someone just looking for something fun to warm up on.  One of my favorite routes at Indian Creek.
content.protection: 12 bolts to chains.  70 meter rope recommended due to the route wandering a bit.
content.location: Stand at the base of the buttress.  The route is just right of Wounded Knee and the big bush on the edge of the road.
